content: the shawl in the towel and stand and/or press on it to remove the last of the excess water 4 pin out the three corners of your shawl on a large surface where it can dry undisturbed be sure to stretch it quite taut beteween the pins if you want straighter edges pin them out with extra pins 5 allow your shawl to dry completely when i block my shawls i use thumbtacks and pin mine out on the wall some people use t-pins and pin out their work on carpet or beds copyright 2007 rodger murry all rights reserved
